translations: v．轻蔑，鄙视：对某人或某事表示强烈的不尊重或不赞同。
· He was scorning her efforts to learn the language.
他嘲笑她学习这门语言的努力。

sentences.sentence: Jealousy is one of the psychology origins of scorning individual moral.
sentences.translation: 嫉妒是蔑视个人的道德的心理根源之一。

sentences.sentence: Those who used to laughing and scorning at me will crawl on my feet before the sludge.
sentences.translation: 那些惯于嘲笑和蔑视的人将匍匐在我的脚前的污泥中。
